text:
Hey <@U06CE7Q3T4Z> :wave:
What issues/warnings do you get after running npm command?

I am getting this error while creating UI extentions in Sandbox account

```The post in account {hubid} was bad. Platform version is missing from your project configuration. Please add the platformVersion field to the hsproject.json file, then try uploading the project again. Available versions: [2023.2].```
When I check, I already have project version in `hsproject.json`

Any idea why this is happening?
Hi Jaydip, just to confirm, do you have a `platformVersion` or a `projectVersion`? You'll want a `platformVersion`.
I just figured out I was using old CLI version and after updating itâ€™s working fine. thanks for quick responce
Great to hear! Thanks for the followup.
